title: # 463 - Chris Distefano, Yannis Pappas & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Chris Distefano and Yannis Pappas. We talk about why they stopped doing History Hyenas, WWI, Japan, Greeks, Partying, and much more!  

 

This episode is also brought to you by Raycon. Get 15% off your order at https://www.buyraycon.com/bertcast 

 

This episode is also brought to you by SA. Buy one face shield and get 4 for free at http://www.safishing.com/bert

 

This episode is also brought to you by Upstart. Find out how Upstart can lower your monthly payments today when you go to http://www.upstart.com/bert
